Name: Abyss The Forgotten Past: Prologue
About the game: ABOUT THIS PROLOGUE Skeletons, Celestial Beings, Magic Swords and a vast beautiful world created in pixel art. All this together with an adventure full of mysteries and puzzles that cannot be told in just one story. Here is a brief summary of what can be found in Abyss The Forgotten Past. Abyss The Forgotten Past: Prologue, is the begining of Leonnor's Tales, play the introduction and Alton's Island with 5 playable stages + BÃ´nus 2 Ice stages The plot was initially based on a table RPG game played in real life. The story is based on rediscovering itself, after an unfortunate event, Leonnor sets out on a journey to discover everything about his past, with special abilities, where monsters, magic and heavenly beings exist. Enter a personal search that will surprise you with each discovery ... Gameplay features -A mysterious and captivating plot, discover everything about Leonnor's past and this world, things are not always what they seem ... -Multiple levels, items and monsters (More in future updates). -A soundtrack that matches each type of stage or situation. -You can play on the keyboard or on your console control! -Several types of weapons (some with magical properties). -The Legendary Excalibur Sword can be found in the game! -Beautiful Pixel art graphics and animations -Puzzles and challenges. -RPG systems (Inventory, levels, weapons forging and etc ...). -Developed for Windows (Mac, Linux and Android coming soon).
